title: 1 bdrm Quiet Corporate MIL
map_address: S Holly St. near Seward Park Avenue
posting_body: If you are looking for a quiet, park- like feel our furnished MIL suite- is worth a look at.

1 bdrm w. king sized bed w. private entrance + 1 3/4 bath + light filled den w. 2 sets of French doors w. private entrance opening up to private deck looking out to the backyard garden + kitchenette + laundry + street parking.
Located in lovely Seward Park 1 mile from the park and 1/2 block from Martha Washington Park.
#50 bus is at the corner 2 houses up and connects to Sound Transit light rail from Sea Tac Airport to North gate stopping downtown.
Numerous delicious restaurants in Columbia City as well as PCC.
A nice place to call home.
Pets on case by case basis.
